Name: Violet's Party Mania
About the game: Violet is hosting a party and is still missing some items! Help her search through the clutter to save the day! Help Violet organize the party by searching through a pile containing over 30 unique objects which she can use to impress her guests. Choose the difficulty that fits you and try to get the highest score possible on the Leaderboards !
